name: The Gate (itch) (Nemnik)
description:
After an accident your soul was broken and you was closed inside your head between life and death.

This place is calles the Gate.

Open all gates to leave this place.

Use special abilities to pass the obstacles.

New ability for every level.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Jump - SPACE

Information about abilities you will get inside the game :)

This is my first game. I made it in 3 months with using only UE4 assets.
